topic.title: Setting a System Property for the Web-based Editor

keywords.indexterm: Content Fusion Enterprise - Set system property

body.p: A variety of Java system properties can be set to influence the behavior of the visual editor embedded in . You would need to edit the /fusion/docker-compose.override.yml file and set the system property under "environment".
The following example would set the amount of available memory to 8 GB: webauthor: environment: - OXYGEN_JAVA_OTPS=-Xmx8g
body.note: The indentation is required in the YML file.
body.p: After modifying this configuration, you need to restart the web-based editor by running the following command in the /fusion directory:docker-compose stop webauthor docker-compose rm -f webauthor docker-compose up -d webauthor
